body:
Something other than http://bitcoin.stackexchange.com/ ?

On Tuesday, 4 October 2016, R E Broadley <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I am noticing a fair number of github issues which are being closed quite
> quickly, either because they are being identified as "questions", or
> because they are deemed to be not appropriate issues for github. I think an
> FAQ that could form part of the bitcoin core distrubution needs to be
> created so that github stops being used for out-of-scope issues - and the
> scope is documented, ideally along with links to where the correct areas
> for asking questions are. Raising this issue to hopefully kickstart that
> process.
>
